title.english: By the Grace of the Gods 2

description:
The second season of Kami-tachi ni Hirowareta Otoko.

Since reincarnating into a new world, Ryouma Takebayashi has used his god-given graces to tame countless slimes and employ them to improve the lives of everyone around him. With the astonishing success of his laundry shop, Bamboo Forest, he is finally ready to take on new frontiers and open a branch in the neighboring city of Lenaf. Abiding by his promise with his dearest friend, Eliaria Jamil, Ryouma makes every day count, whether learning new techniques, forming connections, or even discovering more species of slime.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: เพราะพระเจ้าเลือกเลยได้เกิดใหม่มาเลี้ยงสไลม์ในต่างโลก ภาค 2

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

title.native: スライムたちの井戸端会議２

name.native: リョウマ・タケバヤシ
エリアリア・ジャミール

node.description:
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MindaRynOfficial) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mindaryn_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mindaryn_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/MindaRyn/)

A Thai YouTuber known for singing anisong covers. She has gone on to perform the theme songs to several anime series.

[Profile](www.horipro-international.com/artist/musician/tadokoro) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/azusa-tadokoro) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AzusaTadokoro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/azusa_tadokoro/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tadokoroazusaofficial)

She was a member in the tennis club at her middle and high schools, and she was also the general manager of the club in high school. When Azusa was in 8th grade, she was inspired to become a voice actress after hearing the Akiko Yajima's performance as Kohaku in Inuyasha. She participated in Horipro's 36th Talent Scout Caravan on October 11, 2011, was awarded as the grand prix winner and made her debut as a voice actress in 2012. In 2014, she made her official debut as a singer with the album "Beyond Myself!".

Azusa's hobbies including karaoke, impersonating, making albums, cooking and sewing. Her special skills include tennis - which she has been playing ever since fifth grade of elementary school - and arm wrestling, and she likes to stay healthy. She also loves both cows and movies, and has said that her ideal date would be either tennis or a movie so that she wouldn’t have to talk a lot. Azusa has four older brothers, and she went to the same high school as [Megumi Nakajima](https://anilist.co/staff/96105/Megumi-Nakajima)

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)

Jad is an American voice actress and ADR director who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. Her name is an acronym of her parents' names, Jimmy and David, and is pronounced as Jade. Her singing led to her first voice role in Sasami: Magical Girls Club as Eimi Mori, and her first major voice role was Masako Hara in Ghost Hunt. She graduated summa cum laude from Texas Wesleyan University with a Bachelor of Arts in Music in 2005.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/marianapozatto) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mpozatto) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/mariana.pozatto) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@marianapozatto6440)

Mariana Campanha Pozatto is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, and dubbing director.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Summer Smith (Rick and Morty franchise)
- Miriam "Midge" Maisel (The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel)
- Vex'ahlia / Vex  (The Legend of Vox Machina)
- Alison Parker (Money Heist)
- ElanaBeth "E.B." Weebie (Green Eggs and Ham)

- Mia (The Kissing Booth trilogy)
- Rosaura Salazar (El Guardián Invisible, Legado en los huesos and Ofrenda a la tormenta)
- Sonya (The Babysitter and The Babysitter: Killer Queen)
- Wendy Blob (Hotel Transylvania: The Series)
- Gwen Grande (Polly Pocket 2018)
- Daphne Forestier (HPI: Haut Potentiel Intellectuel)
- Nova Storm (Transformers: Cyberverse)
- Eun Hye-Jung (Love in Her Bag)
- Rachel Patton (The White Lotus)
- Asu Alacahan Kozcuoğlu (2nd dub; Kara Sevda)
- Bahar Çeşmeli (Kadın)
- Maria Lucia Valencia (1st dub; Betty en NY)
- Damla Kıyak (Mucize Doktor)
- Daisy Quokka (Daisy Quokka-World's Scariest Animal)
!~
Ernesto Cronik is a Mexican singer and voice actor.

title.native: 転生したらスライムだった件
